verses.verse: This <S%G5124><s%> is the <S%G5154>third<s%> time I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>. <S%G1909>At<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2476>shall<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> be <S%G2476>established<s%>.

I have said <S%G4280>beforehand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I do say <S%G4302>beforehand<s%>, as <S%G5613>when<s%> I was <S%G3918>present<s%> the second <S%G1208>time<s%>, <S%G2532>so<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>, being <S%G548>absent<s%>, to <S%G3588>them<s%> that have <S%G4258>sinned<s%> <S%G2532>heretofore<s%>, and to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G1519>I<s%> come2064, 1519 <S%G3825>again<s%>, I <S%G5339>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5339>spare<s%>;

seeing <S%G1893><s%> that ye <S%G2212>seek<s%> a <S%G1382>proof<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> that <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>; <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5209>you-ward<s%> <S%G770>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G770>weak<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> is <S%G1414>powerful<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>:

for1063, 2532 he was <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G1537>through<s%> <S%G769>weakness<s%>, <S%G235>yet<s%> he <S%G2198>liveth<s%> <S%G1537>through<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G2249>also<s%> are <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G846>in<s%> <S%G235>him<s%>, <S%G2198>but<s%> we shall <S%G4862>live<s%> <S%G846>with<s%> <S%G1537>him<s%> <S%G1411>through<s%> the <S%G2316>power<s%> of <S%G1519>God<s%> <S%G5209>toward<s%> <S%G1722>you<s%>.

Try <S%G3985><s%> your own <S%G1438>selves<s%>, <S%G1487>whether<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>; <S%G1381>prove<s%> your own <S%G1438>selves<s%>. Or <S%G1921>know<s%> ye <S%G3756>not<s%> as to your own <S%G1438>selves<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>? <S%G1509>unless<s%> indeed ye be2075, Acts0 <S%G96>reprobate<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2172>pray<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4160>that<s%> ye5209, 3361 <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> may <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G1384>approved<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> may <S%G4160>do<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G2570>honorable<s%>, <S%G1161>though<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G96>reprobate<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> we can do1410, Acts0 <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice<s%>, <S%G3752>when<s%> we are <S%G770>weak<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G5600>are<s%> <S%G1415>strong<s%>: <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2172>pray<s%> <S%G5216>for<s%>, even your <S%G2676>perfecting<s%>.

For <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> cause <S%G5124>I<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2443>while<s%> <S%G548>absent<s%>, <S%G3361>that<s%> I may not when <S%G3918>present<s%> <S%G5530>deal<s%> <S%G664>sharply<s%>, <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> for <S%G3619>building<s%> <S%G2532>up<s%>, and <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> casting <S%G2506>down<s%>.

Finally <S%G3063><s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G5463>farewell<s%>. Be <S%G2675>perfected<s%>; be <S%G3870>comforted<s%>; <S%G5426>be<s%> of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%>; live in <S%G1514>peace<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>.

The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2842>communion<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.
